'''''SEVEN 35''''' is the thirty-fifth volume of the [[Marion E. Wade Center]]'s annual journal ''[[SEVEN]]'', published in [[2018]].<ref name="jstor" />
==Contents==
* "The Story of Prince Lucio: G.K. Chesterton and the Visual Imagination"
** By: Danny Gabelman and Jeremiah Mercurio
* "Augustine and C.S. Lewis on Friendship"
** By: Walter Hansen
* "Charles Williams and Friendship"
** By: Sørina Higgins
* "Hugo Dyson: A Roaring Cataract of Nonsense"
** By: Joel Heck
* "Sayers's Use of Secondary Sources in ''The Man Born to be King''"
** By: Kathryn Wehr
* "Warnie at War (1914-1918)"
** By: Don W. King
* "C.S. Lewis: An Exploration Through His Letters"
** By: Henry Hyunsuk Kim
* Review Essays:
** "A Critical Moment in Lewis Gender Studies"
*** By: Brenton Dickieson
** "Echoes of the Eternal in C.S. Lewis's Fiction"
*** By: Brenton Dickieson
* Book Reviews:
** "Review of ''A Well of Wonder: Essays on C.S. Lewis, J.R.R. Tolkien, and the Inklings'' by Clyde S. Kilby, edited by Loren Wilkinson and Keith Call"
*** By: Joel Heck
** "Review of ''Dimensions of Madeleine L'Engle: New Critical Approaches'' edited by Suzanne Bray"
*** By: James E. Beitler III
** "Review of ''Owen Barfield: Philosophy, Poetry, and Theology'' by Michael Vincent Di Fuccia"
*** By: Edwin Woodruff Tait
** "Review of ''The Magician's Twin: C.S. Lewis on Science, Scientism and Society'' edited by John G. West"
*** By: Robert Bishop
** "Review of ''The Inklings and King Arthur: J.R.R. Tolkien, Charles Williams, C.S. Lewis, and Owen Barfield on the Matter of Britain'' edited by Sørina Higgins"
*** By: David Llewellyn Dodds
** "Review of ''ABCs of Christian Life: The Ultimate Anthology of the Prince of Paradox, excerpts by G.K. Chesterton, foreword by Peter Kreeft''"
*** By: Brett H. Speakman
* Book Notes:
** ''Detecting Wimsey: Papers on Dorothy L. Sayers's Detective Fiction''
*** By: Nancy-Lou Patterson
** ''J.R.R. Tolkien: Romanticist and Poet''
*** By: Julian Eilmann<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://journals.wheaton.edu/index.php/vii/article_index|articlename=Contents By Volume|website=[https://journals.wheaton.edu/index.php/vii/index VII: Journal of the Marion E. Wade Center]|accessed=13 August 2025}}</ref>
